introduction: 年轻的单身母亲艾希莉弗里曼，工作繁重，薪水微薄，艰难地抚养儿子戴维。在儿子被杀后，她一无所有，只剩下一直求而不得的时间。她不得不拯救自己的生活。(文：life_is_good@YDY)Young overworked, underpaid, Ashley Freeman, caught in a struggle against time, faces the hardships of being a single parent to her son, Davie. In a tragic turn of events her son is killed leaving her left with nothing more then what she had previously desired most, time. But time now is filled with the torments of the abandonment of her son's father, the sudden and violent death of her only child, and a shattered past, which ultimately becomes a twisted race she must endure to rescue her own life.
